aqgni-ryAvA#nEqvA&gnistaM pra#tiqShThAM ga#mayatiq parAq vA EqShO$&gniM ~Mva#patiq yO$&Psu Basma# pravEqSaya#tiq jyOti#ShmatIByAq-mava# dadhAtiq jyOti#rEqvA&smi#n dadhAtiq dvAByAqM prati#ShThityaiq parAq vA EqSha praqjAM paqSUn 
va#patiq yO$&Psu Basma# pravEqSaya#tiq puna#rUqrjA saqha raqyyEtiq puna#ruqdaiti# praqjAmEqva paqSUnAqtman dha#ttEq puna#stvA&&diqtyA - [  ] 12
